title: Ciao UFO wins best picture in 2025 Hong Kong Film Critics Society awards
description: Ciao UFO, a nostalgic drama that waited over six years to reappear on the big screen after its film festival premiere, has been voted the best Hong Kong film of 2025 by the Hong Kong Film Critics Society (HKFCS), the organisation announced on January 19.The win is a vindication for the film, directed by Patrick Leung Pak-kin (Born Wild), that premiered at the 2019 Hong Kong Asian Film Festival but faced a prolonged delay in release, reportedly due to an investor’s reluctance to greenlight a...

title: Mysterious 'vehicle of unknown origin' hidden at US Navy Base raises questions about secret UFO program
description: New claims about America's alleged UFO program have named a little-known Navy base on the East Coast as one of the most important secret facilities in the country.

title: Mob pressure forces UAP to sack two teachers
description: The removal of the two teachers has sparked widespread criticism on social mediaDetails

title: UFO task force eyed as lawmaker warns of strange objects in skies and waters defying known technology
description: Vermont UFO task force proposed by Rep. Troy Headrick would investigate unidentified anomalous phenomena reports and assess airspace safety risks in coordination with federal partners.

title: Secret Danish UFO Contactees Reveal Aliens Have Spoken to Europe for Centuries
description: Little-known Danish contactees claim extraterrestrials have been speaking to Europe for centuries, from a mysterious 1600 sighting to modern links with Ashtar Command.
